title: The Leopard Prince's Captive Wolf
description: Leopard shifter Prince Celyn’s country has been at war with the land of the werewolves for generations. But when the golden-eyed wolf shifter Einar is wounded and taken prisoner, both are shocked by the explosive chemistry between them. Can the passion they can’t deny forge a connection across the battle lines?  This is a gay shapeshifter paranormal romance story. It has a happily ever after and no cliffhanger.
author: Cherry Dare
